gov.nasa.jpf.autodoc

Class AutoDocTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpf.autodoc.AutoDocTool

  • public class AutoDocTool
extends java.lang.Object
    Automatic Documentation of JPF Components. This class handles command-line options, configures the tool, starts scans and analyses, collects info and controls the output.
    Author:
    Carlos Uribe [carlos.albert.uribe@gmail.com]

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AutoDocTool.Options
      Command-line options to control AutoDocTool functionalities.

      • setDefaults

        public static int setDefaults(int options)
        Set default values for command-line options. Default options are overriden if any AutoDocTool.Options is specified.
        Parameters:
        options - Bitwise value denoting specified options.
        Returns:
        bitwise value denoting default options enabled.

      • isInputCoherent

        public static boolean isInputCoherent(java.util.List<java.lang.String> tgs,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> cp)
        Named package classes must have an associated classpath. If not, this method returns false.
        Parameters:
        tgs - A list of targets.
        cp - A list of classpath pathnames.
        Returns:
        true if classnames are associated with a classpath.
